name: Liam Lawson
satirical_angle: New Zealand nice guy who gives the middle finger to F1 veterans

speaking_style.accent_hints: New Zealand, laid back but sharp

signature_reactions.victory: Humble but satisfied. 'Yeah, good day. Team did well.'
signature_reactions.defeat: Analytical. 'We'll look at it. Room to improve.'

visual_profile.helmet_design: Silver fern elements, Red Bull colors

animation_notes.comedy_exaggeration: casually flips off legends during overtakes

relationships_summary.teammate_dynamic: Yuki is chaotic, Liam is calm - balance

meme_status: The Bird, Kiwi Killer, Reserve No More
storyline_hooks: Replaced Perez, must prove it wasn't a mistake
Will he flip off Max too if needed?
The anti-drama Kiwi in chaos central

example_dialogue.after_overtake: Yeah, that was good. Saw the gap, sent it. Sweet as.
example_dialogue.about_finger_incident: Look, he gave me no room. Sometimes you communicate. *shrugs*
example_dialogue.about_yuki: Yuki's mental on the radio. I just drive. Works for both of us.
example_dialogue.about_max: Max is the benchmark. I'm here to learn... and win.
